# swarm-worker

worker container

```bash

# tail the container log
ssh swarm@consent2.snowball.global sudo docker logs -f swarm-worker1
ssh swarm@consent2.snowball.global sudo docker logs -f swarm-worker2
ssh swarm@consent2.snowball.global sudo docker logs -f swarm-worker3

# connect to container shell
ssh -t swarm@consent2.snowball.global sudo docker exec -it swarm-worker1 bash
ssh -t swarm@consent2.snowball.global sudo docker exec -it swarm-worker2 bash
ssh -t swarm@consent2.snowball.global sudo docker exec -it swarm-worker3 bash
```
